1405750.name: Booobjz Demo
1405750.description:
There are only two levels in the demo version of the game!
All the fun in the full version ...

The full version of the game contains everything described below ..

Description short
Booobjz - Super computer head of the space research corporation.
The corporation sends a super soldier in a universal protective suit to a dangerous planet, you have to face alien enemies and unravel the mystery of the death of the first ten expeditions.

History
After the one hundred and twenty-fifth world war, the surviving inhabitants of the planet "Koitia", exhausted by wars and epidemics, no longer trust themselves.
The governments of all countries in a general referendum decide to transfer all power to the super computer "Booobjz". An impartial machine brain writes laws and issues orders, while members of the new elite follow orders and send researchers to a nearby planet with abundant natural resources. Ten expeditions are in distress. And now one of the engineers of this system, Bruce Barris, creates an exoskeleton from super strong and lightweight materials.
On a competitive basis, the best residents have been selected and trained for 150 years. When everything is ready, the chosen representative goes on the Travel with the necessary preparation, but without full information.
Will the flight be successful or not? We have to find out.

They decide to name the expedition “Booobjz” after the super computer.

Features:
  • Many secrets
  • Meeting ghosts
  • Super suits capable of pushing off vertical surfaces
